name: Hole The Ball (WebGL)
description:
!!! PLAY in FULL SCREEN !!!

The main objective of the game is to take the fewest number of strokes to  putt the ball in the hole. On the way, you can collect coins which can be used to buy balls.

This is a WebGL version, you can download PC version here: https://jasuribragimov.itch.io/hole-the-ball
